name: GitHub Blind Screening
description: Hides names and pictures from GitHub profiles to allow 'blind screening' of profiles for more objective candidate selection
css:
@-moz-document domain("github.com") {
.vcard-avatar,
.vcard-fullname,
.vcard-username,
.user-profile-bio,
li[itemprop="email"],
li[itemprop="url"],
.user-profile-mini-vcard,
.author,
.commit-author-section,
.commit-tease .avatar,
.commit-tease .user-mention,
.commit-avatar-cell .avatar-parent-child,
.timeline-comment-wrapper > a,
.participant-avatar,
.opened-by > a,
.select-menu-list[data-filter="author"] a,
.select-menu-list[data-filter="assignee"] a,
.capped-card h3,
.network-graph-container,
.network .repo a:first-of-type,
.network .repo .gravatar {
    visibility: hidden;
}
}
